menu_game_paused._context: Displayed at the top of the game paused menu

menu_resume_game._context: Text of the button that closes the paused menu and resumes the game

menu_save_game._context: Text of the button that saves the game as a file at its previous save location

menu_save_game_as._context: Text of the button that prompts the user for a save location and then saves the game as a file at that location

menu_choose_save_location._context: Title of the window that prompts the user for a save location

menu_save_file._context: Name of the file format ('.bin') used to store a save file (storing game progress)

menu_to_main_menu._context: Text of the button that returns the user to the main menu

menu_new_game._context: Text of the button used to start a new game

menu_load_previous_game._context: Text of a button used to load a previously loaded game
menu_load_previous_game._placeholders: The path (or part of it) of the previously loaded game

menu_load_game._context: Text of the button used to load a specific file

menu_choose_load_location._context: Title of the window that prompts the user for a load location

menu_settings._context: Text of the button used to open the game settings

menu_exit_game._context: Text of the button used to close the game

menu_save_file_too_old._context: Shown when a save file from an older version of the game is attempted to be loaded
menu_save_file_too_old.de: Die geladene Spieldatei kann nur mit einer älteren Version des Spiels geladen werden. :(
menu_save_file_too_old.en: The selected save file can only be loaded with an older version of the game. :(
menu_save_file_too_old.bg: Избраната записана игра може да бъде заредена само с по-стара версия на играта. :(

menu_save_file_too_new._context: Shown when the player attempts to load a save file from a newer version of the game
menu_save_file_too_new.de: Diese Version des Spiels ist zu alt. Verwenden sie eine neuere Version, um die gewählte Spieldatei zu laden.
menu_save_file_too_new.en: This version of the game is outdated. Use a newer version of the game to load the selected file.
menu_save_file_too_new.bg: Тази версия на играта е остаряла. Използвайте по-нова версия, за да заредите избрания файл.

menu_loading._context: Shown when the game is loading for a longer amount of time

menu_copyright_notice._context: The copyright notice text as displayed in the main menu

menu_music_volume._context: Displayed over the slider that controls the music volume

menu_sound_volume._context: Displayed over the slider that controls the volume of sound effects

menu_view_distance._context: Displayed over the slider that controls the view distance of the game

menu_yes._context: Text of a button that shows that a setting is enabled

menu_no._context: Text of a button that shows that a setting is disabled

menu_fullscreen._context: Setting for making the game run in fullscreen mode

menu_dithering._context: Setting for toggling dithering in shaders, using small repeating patterns to simulate intermediate colors in a limited palette.

menu_pixelation._context: Setting for toggling pixelated rendering. When enabled, the game renders at a fixed lower resolution, maintaining a retro look. When disabled, it renders at the full window resolution.

menu_ui_size._context: Displayed over the slider that controls the size of the user interface

menu_close_menu._context: Confirms and closes the current menu (e.g. credits, settings)

ui_building_selection._context: Title of the building selection UI (when building a building)

ui_product_selection._context: Title of the product selection UI (of a building when selecting it)

ui_required_workers._context: The number of workers needed by a building

ui_provided_workers._context: The number of workers provided by a building

ui_bridge_selection._context: Title of the bridge type selection UI (when building a bridge)

ui_building_complex._context: Title of the building complex (a collection of buildings) information UI

ui_inputs._context: The optimal consumption / inputs of a building complex

ui_outputs._context: The optimal outputs / products of a building complex (given the optimal inputs are met)

ui_storage._context: Lists the stored items of a building complex underneath

ui_empty._context: Displayed when a building complex or carriage does not hold any items, or when the schedule of a carriage is empty

ui_current_position._context: The current position of the player, used in the map legend for the player marker

ui_personal_horse._context: The current position of the player's personal horse, used in the map legend for its marker

ui_carriage._context: Used as the title of the carriage info UI and the current position of a carriage in the map legend for the carriage markers

ui_train._context: Used as the title of the train info UI and the current position of a train in the map legend for the train markers

ui_boat._context: Used as the title of the boat info UI and the current position of a boat in the map legend for the boat markers

ui_status_no_instructions._context: Displayed as the status of a carriage (or other agent like a train) when its schedule (list of places to go to) is empty

ui_status_transferring._context: Displayed as the status of a carriage (or other agent like a train) when it is currently in the process of transferring items at one of its scheduled stops

ui_status_travelling._context: Displayed as the status of a carriage (or other agent like a train) when it is currently travelling to one of its scheduled stops
ui_status_travelling._placeholders: The number of the stop the carriage is currently travelling to

ui_status_lost._context: Displayed as the status of a carriage (or other agent like a train) when it has no valid path to its next scheduled stop (it is 'lost')
ui_status_lost._placeholders: The number of the stop the carriage is trying to travel to

ui_remove_carriage._context: Text of the button used to remove / scrap (no refund) a carriage

ui_remove_train._context: Text of the button used to remove / scrap (no refund) a train

ui_remove_boat._context: Text of the button used to remove / scrap (no refund) a boat

ui_train_add_car._context: Text of the button used to append a car to a train

ui_train_remove_car._context: Text of the button used to remove a car from a train

ui_schedule._context: The schedule (list of stops the carriage is scheduled to go to, and what to do once there) of a carriage (or other agent like a train)

ui_pick_up._context: Schedule item can be set to 'Pick up' items (move items from carriage to buildings) at some set building complex (or other location)

ui_drop_off._context: Schedule item can be set to 'Drop off' items (move items from buildings to carriage) at some set building complex (or other location)

ui_maintain._context: Schedule item can be set to 'Maintain' a certain level of items at some set building complex (or other location)

ui_add_stop._context: Button used to add a building complex as a stop to a carriage's schedule

ui_click_target_complex._context: Prompts the user to click the building complex the carriage should stop at on the map

ui_on_board._context: Same as 'ui_storage', but for carriages (and later possibly trains) - Lists the stored items on board of a carriage underneath

ui_required._context: Shown in the research viewer - title of the section that tells the user how much they need to produce to unlock the given advancement

toast_saved_game._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the game has been saved
toast_saved_game._placeholders: The location that the game has been saved at

toast_auto_saved_game._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the game has been saved automatically

toast_failed_to_save_game._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the game could not be saved
toast_failed_to_save_game.en: 💾 Game was unable to be saved.
toast_failed_to_save_game.bg: 💾 Играта не можа да бъде запазена.

toast_failed_to_auto_save_game._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the game could not be saved automatically
toast_failed_to_auto_save_game.de: 💾 Spiel konnte nicht automatisch gespeichert werden.
toast_failed_to_auto_save_game.en: 💾 Game was unable to be saved automatically.
toast_failed_to_auto_save_game.bg: 💾 Играта не можа да бъде запазена автоматично.

toast_indestructible._context: Pop-up that notifies the user when they try to demolish buildings they aren't allowed to (note: localized text should be why they can't do it, not what they did)
toast_indestructible.de: Dieses Gebäude kann nicht abgerissen werden.
toast_indestructible.en: This building may not be demolished.
toast_indestructible.bg: Тази сграда не може да бъде унищожена.

toast_terrain_occupied._context: Pop-up that notifies the user when they try to modify terrain under a building, bridge or train tracks (note: localized text should be why they can't do it, not what they did)
toast_terrain_occupied.de: Gelände unter Strukturen kann nicht bearbeitet werden!
toast_terrain_occupied.en: Terrain occupied by structures may not be modified!
toast_terrain_occupied.bg: Земя, заета от структури, не може да се променя.

toast_invalid_building_placement._context: Pop-up that notifies the user when they try to place a building on uneven terrain (note: localized text should be why they can't do it, not what they did)
toast_invalid_building_placement.de: Gebäude müssen auf flachem, freiem Bodem plaziert werden!
toast_invalid_building_placement.en: Buildings must be placed on flat, unoccupied ground!
toast_invalid_building_placement.bg: Сгради тряба да се поставят на плоска и свободна земя!

toast_building_requires_resource._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the building they attempted to build needs to be placed on a specific resource
toast_building_requires_resource._placeholder: The localized name of the resource it needs to be placed on
toast_building_requires_resource.en: Building needs to be placed on {}!
toast_building_requires_resource.bg: Сградата трябва да бъде построена върху {}!

toast_too_expensive._context: Pop-up that notifies the user when they try to do something they cannot afford
toast_too_expensive._placeholders: The number of coins the operation would cost if they could afford it

toast_added_coins._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that coins have been added to their balance

toast_removed_coins._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that coins have been removed from their balance

toast_missing_unemployment._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the operation was cancelled because not enough workers are or would be available
toast_missing_unemployment._placeholders: #1: number of workers that are or would be available; #2: number of workers required after the operation

toast_no_valid_carriage_location._context: Pop-up that informs the user when they try to create a carriage at a stable, but the stable is not adjacent to any paths
toast_no_valid_carriage_location.de: Kein gültiger Ort für eine Kutsche in der Nähe!
toast_no_valid_carriage_location.en: There is no valid location for a carriage nearby!
toast_no_valid_carriage_location.bg: Няма валидна локация за каруци на около!

toast_no_valid_train_location._context: Pop-up that informs the user when they try to create a train at a depot, but the depot does not have any tracks in front of it
toast_no_valid_train_location.de: Kein gültiger Ort für einen Zug in der Nähe!
toast_no_valid_train_location.en: There is no valid location for a train nearby!
toast_no_valid_train_location.bg: Няма валидна локация за влакове на около!

toast_no_valid_boat_location._context: Pop-up that informs the user when they try to create a boat at a yard, but the yard does not have any water nearby
toast_no_valid_boat_location.de: Kein gültiger Ort für ein Boot in der Nähe!
toast_no_valid_boat_location.en: There is no valid location for a boat nearby!
toast_no_valid_boat_location.bg: Няма валидна локация за лодки на около!

toast_carriage_lost._context: Pop-up that informs that a carriage has now become lost (meaning the carriage can't find a path to its next scheduled stop, related to 'ui_status_lost')

toast_train_lost._context: Pop-up that informs that a train has now become lost (meaning the train can't find a path to its next scheduled stop, related to 'ui_status_lost')

toast_boat_lost._context: Pop-up that informs that a boat has now become lost (meaning the boat can't find a path to its next scheduled stop, related to 'ui_status_lost')

toast_personal_horse_travelling._context: Shown when the personal horse is instructed to come to the player usign the [H] button.
toast_personal_horse_travelling.de: Ihr Pferd ist auf dem Weg zu ihnen.
toast_personal_horse_travelling.en: Your horse is on its way to you.

toast_bridge_too_short._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the bridge they attempted to build is too short

toast_bridge_too_high._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the bridge they attempted to build is too high up

toast_bridge_ends_dont_match._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the ends of the bridge they attempted to build are not on the same height
toast_bridge_ends_dont_match.de: Brückenenden sind nicht auf der selben Höhe!
toast_bridge_ends_dont_match.en: Bridge ends are not on the same height!
toast_bridge_ends_dont_match.bg: Краищата на мостта не са на едно и също ниво!

toast_research_complete._context: Pop-up that notifies the user that the conditions for some research have been met
toast_research_complete._placeholders: The localized name of the completed research

item_name_coal._context: Name of the coal item and natural resource

item_name_crude_oil._context: Name of the crude oil item and natural resource

item_name_salt._context: Name of the salt item and natural resource

item_name_iron_ore._context: Name of the iron ore item and natural resource

item_name_copper_ore._context: Name of the copper ore item and natural resource

item_name_zinc_ore._context: Name of the zinc ore item and natural resource

item_name_brass_rods._context: Name of the brass rods item

item_name_brass_plates._context: Name of the brass plates item

item_name_brass_gears._context: Name of the brass gears item

item_name_brass_pots._context: Name of the brass pots item

item_name_oil_lanterns._context: Name of the oil lanterns item

item_name_steel_beams._context: Name of the steel beams item

item_name_power_looms._context: Name of the power looms item, a mechanically powered loom used to make fabric

item_name_steam_engines._context: Name of the steam engines item, a machine that converts heat into rotational energy

building_name_farmland._context: Name of the 'building' that is a simple field used to grow crops

building_name_mineshaft._context: Name of the 'building' that is used to dig up goods from under the ground

building_name_windmill._context: Name of the building that converts wind power into rotational energy to process goods

building_name_factory._context: Name of the industrial brick building with large chimneys that contains machines to process goods

building_name_house._context: Name of the building that people live in

building_name_stable._context: Name of the building that horses are kept in

building_name_plaza._context: Name of the 'building' that is a market square where merchants can sell goods

building_name_mansion._context: Name of the building that is the villa / mansion the player lives in

building_name_pasture._context: Name of a patch of grass that is used for animals to graze (eat grass)

building_name_tree_farm._context: Name of a piece of land that is used to raise trees for production of wood

building_name_train_depot._context: Name of a large building used to store and maintain trains

building_name_ship_yard._context: Name of a building and the land around it used to construct and maintain ships

bridge_name_wooden._context: Name for a bridge made out of wood

bridge_name_stone._context: Name for a bridge made out of stone

bridge_name_metal._context: Name for a bridge made out metal (iron, steel, ...)

carriage_name_round._context: Name of the carriage type that is used to transport goods

carriage_name_passenger._context: Name of the carriage type that is used to transport passengers

locomotive_name_basic._context: Name of the most basic type of locomotive, inspired by the 'Planet' locomotive built by Robert Stephenson.

locomotive_name_small._context: Name of the small type of locomotive, inspired by the LSWR 0298 Class ('Beattie Well Tank') locomotive No. 44 designed by Joseph Beattie.

boat_name_sail._context: Name of a boat that uses sails for propulsion, used for transport of goods

dialogue_press_to_continue._context: Displayed at the bottom of every dialogue when it is over

dialogue_peasant_name_male._context: Displayed name of a male peasant when talked to

dialogue_peasant_name_female._context: Displayed name of a female peasant when talked to

dialogue_peasant_0._context: One of the possible greetings when talking with peasants
dialogue_peasant_0.en: Oh, your lordship! Is there something I can help your lordship with?
dialogue_peasant_0.de: Oh, Herr Graf! Gibt es etwas, womit ich Euch dienen kann?
dialogue_peasant_0.bg: О, Ваше благородие! С нещо мога ли да Ви помогна?

dialogue_peasant_1._context: One of the possible greetings when talking with peasants
dialogue_peasant_1.en: That I would one day speak to your lordship... I must tell my children about this!
dialogue_peasant_1.de: Dass ich eines Tages mit Euer Gnaden sprechen würde... Davon muss ich meinen Kindern erzählen!
dialogue_peasant_1.bg: Че аз някога ще говоря с Ваше благородие... Трябва да разкажа на децата си за това!

dialogue_peasant_2._context: One of the possible greetings when talking with peasants
dialogue_peasant_2.en: I feel truly proud to live in such a pretty part of the Kingdom.
dialogue_peasant_2.de: Ich bin wirklich stolz darauf, in so einem schönen Teil des Königreichs zu leben.
dialogue_peasant_2.bg: Чувствам се наистина горд, че живея в толкова хубава част на кралството.

dialogue_peasant_3._context: One of the possible greetings when talking with peasants
dialogue_peasant_3.en: May the goddess protect your lordship.
dialogue_peasant_3.de: Möge die Göttin über Euer Gnaden wachen.

dialogue_peasant_4._context: One of the possible greetings when talking with peasants
dialogue_peasant_4.en: I am most honored to be visited by your lordship.
dialogue_peasant_4.de: Es ist mir eine große Ehre, von Euer Gnaden besucht zu werden.
dialogue_peasant_4.bg: За мен е най-голяма чест да бъда посетен от Ваше благородие.

dialogue_maid_name._context: Displayed name of the maid when talked to

dialogue_maid_0._context: One of the possible dialogues when talking to the maid
dialogue_maid_0.en: My lordship, is there possibly any way in which I may assist you?
dialogue_maid_0.de: Euer Gnaden, gibt es möglicherweise etwas, womit ich Euch behilflich sein könnte?
dialogue_maid_0.bg: Благородие, има ли някакъв начин, по който бих могла да ви бъда от полза?

dialogue_maid_1._context: One of the possible dialogues when talking to the maid
dialogue_maid_1.en: Is it already time for dinner? I shall start preparations immediately.
dialogue_maid_1.de: Ist es bereits Zeit für das Abendmahl? Ich werde sogleich mit der Zubereitung beginnen.
dialogue_maid_1.bg: Вече ли настъпи часът за вечеря? Ще пристъпя към приготовленията незабавно.

dialogue_maid_2._context: One of the possible dialogues when talking to the maid
dialogue_maid_2.en: If your lordship has any problems with my work, please feel free to speak your mind.
dialogue_maid_2.de: Sollte Euer Gnaden jegliche Beanstandungen an meiner Arbeit haben, so zögert nicht, es mir mitzuteilen.
dialogue_maid_2.bg: Ако благородието има някакви забележки относно моята служба, моля, не се колебайте да ги изкажете.

dialogue_tutorial_prompt_name._context: Displayed name of the prompts shown in the tutorial

dialogue_tutorial_father_name._context: Displayed name of the father of the player in the tutorial

dialogue_tutorial_instructions_name._context: Displayed name of the instructions the father has given to the player in the second tutorial

dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_0._context: The prompt tells the player that they can use the tab key to skip the tutorial
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_0.en: You may press the tab key to skip this tutorial at any time.
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_0.de: Du kannst dieses Tutorial jederzeit mit der Tabulatortaste überspringen.
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_0.bg: Можеш да натиснеш клавиша Tab, за да пропуснеш този урок по всяко време.

dialogue_tutorial_0_father_1._context: The count father tells his small son to go and take a walk with him
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_1.en: Come son, let us take a walk.
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_1.de: Komm Sohn, lass uns spazieren gehen.

dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_2._context: The prompt tells the player to use certain keys to move around
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_2.en: Press [W], [A], [S] and [D] to move around and follow your father.
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_2.de: Drücke [W], [A], [S] und [D], um dich zu bewegen und folge deinem Vater.
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_2.bg: Натисни [W], [A], [S] и [D], за да се движиш, и следвай баща си.

dialogue_tutorial_0_father_3._context: The father asks his son whether he can see the other end of the path, since it suddenly ended
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_3.en: The path suddenly ended... Can you see the other end?
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_3.de: Der Pfad endet hier plötzlich... Kannst du das andere Ende sehen?
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_3.bg: Пътеката внезапно свършва... Виждаш ли другия й край?

dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_4._context: The prompt tells the player to use the mouse wheel to zoom out the camera
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_4.en: Use the scroll wheel to zoom the camera in and out.
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_4.de: Drehe das Mausrad, um die Kamera heraus- oder hereinzuzoomen.
dialogue_tutorial_0_prompt_4.bg: Използвай колелцето на мишката, за да приближиш или отдалечиш камерата.

dialogue_tutorial_0_father_5._context: The player zoomed out the camera and can now see the path

dialogue_tutorial_0_father_6._context: The final dialogue of the father in the first tutorial
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_6.en: Take a good look at this land my son, as for one day you shall inherit it.
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_6.de: Schau dir dieses Land gut an, mein Sohn, da du es eines Tages erben wirst.
dialogue_tutorial_0_father_6.bg: Погледни добре тази земя, сине мой, защото един ден ще я наследиш.

dialogue_tutorial_1_father_0._context: Father greets his son at the start of the second tutorial
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_0.en: Hello, my son. As you know, I want you to take over my position as count in the near future.
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_0.de: Hallo, mein Sohn. Wie du bereits weißt, möchte ich, dass du bald meine Position als Graf übernimmst.
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_0.bg: Здравей, сине мой. Както знаеш, искам скоро да поемеш моето място като граф.

dialogue_tutorial_1_father_1._context: Father explains his task for his son to prepare him for his abdication
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_1.en: For that reason, I am tasking you with developing the area around the village in the east.
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_1.de: Deshalb gebe ich dir die Aufgabe, das Gebiet um das Dorf im Osten weiterzuentwickeln.
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_1.bg: Затова ти възлагам задачата да развиеш района около селото на изток.

dialogue_tutorial_1_father_2._context: Father tells the player what he is giving him
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_2.en: Take this map, some money and this list of instructions with you.
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_2.de: Nimm diese Karte, etwas Geld und diese Liste mit Anweisungen mit.
dialogue_tutorial_1_father_2.bg: Вземи тази карта, малко пари и този списък с напътствия.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_3._context: Explains to the user that they can open the map using the M key
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_3.en: Open the map at any time by pressing [M].
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_3.de: Du kannst die Karte jederzeit mit [M] öffnen.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_3.bg: Отвори картата по всяко време, като натиснеш [M].

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_4._context: Explains to the user that they can call their horse by presing the H key
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_4.en: Call your horse from anywhere by pressing [H]. Press space to get off the horse.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_4.de: Rufe dein Pferd von überall, indem du [H] drückst. Drücke die Leertaste, um abzusteigen.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_4.bg: Извикай коня си от всяко място, като натиснеш [H]. Натисни Space, за да слезеш.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_5._context: First, the instructions tell the player to ensure that there is a path over the river to the east of the village
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_5.en: First, I want you to make sure that there is a way to the farmland near the village.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_5.de: Zuerst möchte ich, dass du sicherstellst, dass es einen Weg zu den Feldern nahe dem Dorf gibt.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_5.bg: Първо искам да се увериш, че има път до земеделските земи край селото.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_6.en: The farmland is just across the river to the east of the village.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_6.de: Die Felder liegen direkt auf der anderen Seite des Flusses, östlich des Dorfes.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_6.bg: Земеделските земи са точно от другата страна на реката, на изток от селото.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_7._context: Instructs the player to build a bridge to cross the river
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_7.en: In the case that there is no way across, I need you to make a new bridge across the river.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_7.de: Sollte es keinen Weg über den Fluss geben, so möchte ich, dass du eine neue Brücke baust.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_7.bg: Ако няма път през реката, искам да построиш нов мост.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_8._context: Explains to the user that they can create bridges by clicking the bridge icon in the bottom left
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_8.en: Click the bridge icon in the bottom left of the screen or press [B] to open the bridge menu.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_8.de: Klicke das Brückensymbol unten links oder drücke [M], um das Brückenmenü zu öffnen.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_8.bg: Кликни върху иконата на моста в долния ляв ъгъл или натисни [B], за да отвориш менюто за мостове.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_9.en: You can then create a bridge by dragging between two cliffs of equal elevation.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_9.de: Danach kannst du eine Brücke zwischen zwei Klippen gleicher Höhe ziehen.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_9.bg: След това можеш да построиш мост, като плъзнеш между два склона с еднаква височина.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_10._context: Father instructs the player to build a windmill
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_10.en: This area already has bakeries and farmland, but we need a windmill.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_10.de: Dieses Gebiet hat bereits Bäckereien und Felder, aber wir brauchen noch eine Windmühle.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_10.bg: Тази област вече има пекарни и земеделски полета, но ни трябва и вятърна мелница.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_11.en: Build a new windmill for flour near the farmland.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_11.de: Baue eine neue Windmühle für Mehl neben den Feldern.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_11.bg: Построй нова вятърна мелница за брашно близо до нивите.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_12._context: Informs the user how to open the build menu.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_12.en: Clicking the hammer icon in the bottom left of the screen or pressing [C] opens the construction menu.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_12.de: Klicke auf das Hammersymbol unten links oder drücke [C], um das Baumenü zu öffnen.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_12.bg: Кликни върху иконата с чук в долния ляв ъгъл или натисни [C], за да отвориш строителното меню.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_13._context: Informs the user about the production statistics in the map.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_13.en: Clicking on the farmland on the map ([M]) shows us that it produces wheat.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_13.de: Wenn wir auf der Karte ([M]) auf die Felder klicken, sehen wir, dass sie Weizen produzieren.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_13.bg: Ако кликнем върху нивите на картата ([M]), ще видим, че произвеждат пшеница.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_14._context: Informs the user to match inputs / outputs.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_14.en: Therefore we can build a windmill for flour, as it requires wheat.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_14.de: Deswegen können wir eine Windmühle für Mehl bauen, da sie Weizen benötigt.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_14.bg: Затова можем да построим мелница за брашно, тъй като тя изисква пшеница.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_15._context: Informs the user that buildings built close to each other share storage.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_15.en: Buildings placed next to each other have a shared storage.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_15.de: Gebäude, die nebeneinander stehen, haben ein gemeinsames Lager.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_15.bg: Сгради, построени една до друга, споделят общ склад.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_16._context: Father instructs the player to next build a stable
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_16.en: After that is done, I need you to fix up the path leading to the farmland.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_16.de: Nachdem das erledigt ist, möchte ich, dass du den Pfad zu den Feldern in Ordnung bringst.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_16.bg: След като това е направено, искам да поправиш пътеката към нивите.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_17._context: Informs the user how to add / remove paths.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_17.en: Open the pathing menu by clicking the trowel (right-most) icon in the bottom left or by pressing [V].
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_17.de: Öffne das Pfadmenü, indem du das Kellensymbol (ganz rechts) unten links anklickst oder [V] drückst.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_17.bg: Отвори менюто за пътеки, като кликнеш върху иконата с мистрия (най-вдясно) в долния ляв ъгъл или натиснеш [V].

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_18._context: Informs the user how to use the pathing mode.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_18.en: With the pathing menu open left clicking then adds paths, while right clicking removes them.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_18.de: Mit geöffnetem Pfadmenü erstellt die linke Maustaste Pfade, während die Rechte sie entfernt.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_18.bg: С отворено меню за пътеки левият бутон на мишката създава пътеки, а десният ги премахва.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_19._context: Father explains to the player why they need a carriage
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_19.en: Now we only need a way to move the flour to the village, where the bakeries are.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_19.de: Jetzt müssen wir das Mehl nur noch irgendwie zum Dorf bringen, wo die Bäckereien sind.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_19.bg: Сега трябва само да закараме брашното до селото, където са пекарните.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_20._context: Father tells the player to build a stable
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_20.en: For this reason I want you to build a stable next to the path.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_20.de: Deshalb möchte ich, dass du einen Pferdestall baust.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_21._context: Father instructs the player to create a carriage
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_21.en: Next, I need you to create a carriage.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_21.bg: След това трябва да направиш каруца.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_22._context: Tells the user how to make a carriage
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_22.en: Click the stable without having any other menus open.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_22.de: Klicke auf den Stall, ohne jegliche andere Menüs offen zu haben.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_22.bg: Кликни върху конюшнята, без да имаш отворени други менюта.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_23.en: This reveals a button you can use to create a new carriage.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_23.de: Dadurch erscheint ein Knopf, mit dem du eine Kutsche erstellen kannst.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_23.bg: Това ще покаже бутон, с който можеш да направиш каруца.

dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_24._context: Father instructs the player to create a carriage
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_24.en: Now you just need to tell the driver to transport the flour to the village.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_24.de: Jetzt musst du dem Kutscher nur noch erklären, dass er das Mehl zum Dorf bringen soll.
dialogue_tutorial_1_instructions_24.bg: Сега просто трябва да обясниш на кочияша да закара брашното до селото.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_25._context: Tells the user that carriages show up on the map
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_25.en: The newly created carriage is also visible on the map ([M] to open).
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_25.de: Die neu erstellte Kutsche ist auf der Karte sichtbar ([M], um zu öffnen).
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_25.bg: Новосъздадената каруца също е видима на картата ([M] за отваряне).

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_26._context: Tells the user how to configure carriages
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_26.en: Clicking the carriage on the map allows you to configure them.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_26.de: Kutschen lassen sich konfigurieren, indem du auf der Karte auf sie klickst.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_26.bg: Каруците могат да се конфигурират, като кликнеш върху тях на картата.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_27.en: A carriage must be told where to go and what to transfer there.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_27.de: Einer Kutsche muss gesagt werden, wohin sie fahren soll und was sie dort verlagern soll.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_27.bg: Трябва да кажеш на каруцата къде да отиде и какво да пренесе там.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_28._context: Tells the user that carriages need an unbroken path to their destination
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_28.en: Carriages can only travel to their destinations on pathed tiles or bridges.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_28.de: Kutschen können nur über Pfade oder Brücken zu ihren Zielen fahren.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_28.bg: Каруците могат да се движат само по пътеки или мостове.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_29._context: Tells the user (again) to set up a carriage to transport the flour to the village
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_29.en: Configure the carriage to transport flour from the farmland to the village center.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_29.de: Konfiguriere die Kutsche, um Mehl von den Feldern zum Dorfzentrum zu bringen.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_29.bg: Конфигурирай каруцата така, че да транспортира брашно от нивите до центъра на селото.

dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_30._context: Tells the user that the tutorial is done
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_30.en: Congratulations! You have completed the tutorial.
dialogue_tutorial_1_prompt_30.de: Glückwunsch! Du hast das Tutorial abgeschlossen.

dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_0._context: The maid asks the player if they may enter
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_0.en: My lordship, may I enter? I have urgent news to report.
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_0.de: Euer Gnaden, darf ich eintreten? Ich bringe dringende Kunde.
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_0.bg: Благородие, позволете ли ми да вляза? Нося спешна вест.

dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_1._context: The maid reports that she has found very old books about something called 'Industrialization'
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_1.en: While I was cleaning the mansion I found a book titled "Industrialization".
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_1.de: Während ich das Herrenhaus säuberte, entdeckte ich ein Buch mit dem Titel "Industrialisierung".
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_1.bg: Докато почиствах имението, открих книга, озаглавена "Индустриализация".

dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_2._context: The maid tells the player that she has no idea what it means
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_2.en: I have never heard of something like that before, and the book seems quite hard to read too...
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_2.de: Nie zuvor habe ich von etwas dergleichen vernommen, und das Buch ist zudem höchst schwer zu entziffern...
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_2.bg: Никога досега не бях чувала за нещо подобно, а книгата също така изглежда извънредно трудна за разчитане...

dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_3._context: The maid excuses herself for peeking into the book
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_3.en: Oh! My lordship, please excuse me. I should not have peeked into the book without prior consent.
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_3.de: Oh! Euer Gnaden, verzeiht mir. Es war nicht meine Absicht, ohne Eure Erlaubnis in das Buch zu blicken.
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_3.bg: О, Благородие, простете ми! Не възнамерявах да надничам в книгата без Ваше позволение.

dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_4._context: The maid tells the count (player) that she will put the book into the bookshelf
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_4.en: I will swiftly put it into the bookshelf.
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_4.de: Ich werde es sogleich im Bücherregal verstauen.
dialogue_tutorial_2_maid_4.bg: Ще я поставя веднага на лавицата.

dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_5._context: Tells the user that they can interact with the bookshelf to read the books
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_5.en: Interact with the bookshelf to read the book.
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_5.de: Interagiere mit dem Bücherregal, um das Buch zu lesen.
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_5.bg: Докоснете лавицата, за да прочетете книгата.

dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_6._context: Tells the user that they can press escape to pause the game
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_6.en: Press the escape key to pause the game and save, change settings or exit.
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_6.de: Drücke die Escape-Taste, um zu pausieren und zu speichern, Einstellungen zu ändern oder zu verlassen.
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_6.bg: Натиснете Escape, за да поставите играта на пауза, да запазите, промените настройките или да излезете.

dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_7._context: Tells the user that they are now free to do whatever they want
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_7.en: You are now the count of this county and free to manage it however you like.
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_7.de: Du bist hiermit der Graf dieses Bezirks und kannst es verwalten, so wie du es möchtest.
dialogue_tutorial_2_prompt_7.bg: Вече сте графът на този окръг и сте свободни да го управлявате, както пожелаете.
